title: A.C. LOADS
fullText:
There are three common configurations for stand-alone system connection to a.c. loads as follows:
(a) Where the stand-alone system directly feeds a single load (such as a water pump). Requirements for these systems are contained in Clause 4.4.
(b) Where the stand-alone system provides power to a single switchboard (the installation's main switchboard) and circuits provide power for light, power outlets, water pump(s) or similar equipment. The connection requirements specific to standalone systems are covered in Clause 4.5.
(c) Where the stand-alone system provides power to several buildings. Requirements for these systems are contained in Clause 4.6.
